Summary: Witnessed a bright blue-white ufo go from almost invisible / dark to glowing white and shoot off into the distance.
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There was one other sighting in Edmonton on or around November 24th 2012
divs: sighting detailswas outside of my house early saturday morning, nov, 24th 2012 and witnessed a bright blue-white ufo go from almost invisible \ dark to glowing white and shoot off into the distance. this happened over approxamately 30 seconds in total. a very quick yet clearly none human event. coverage: how far away? about a half mile from our house best i can tell, and it moved like nothing i've ever seen before... definately under some sort of intelligent control, but at speeds i'm not at all familiar with. i believe it was actually moving out of the way of an incoming airliner i could hear heading to the airport i'm prolly off a good bit here, but it appeared to go from a dead stop, to well over 1500 km\h in a matter of a split second and then back to a stop around 2 miles away where it just dissappeared into darkness. jim yake
